text:
I see duplicate messages in log4j output. when i read about the same bug on 
troubleshooting page, asked to check for appenders. I did, but still i have 
problem. could you explain with some examples all the scenarios when this 
occurs and their correction.
creator: ramrjy10016@yahoo.com

text:
This is not a bug report. Send email to log4j-user@jakarta.apache.org for 
support.
creator: ceki@apache.org
